arStrings.szText: Access The Pit by spending {c_highlight}Artificer's Stones{/c} at the {c_highlight}Artificer's Obelisk{/c} in Cerrigar.
Successfully complete The Pit by defeating the dungeon boss within the Mastery Timer.
Upgrade the {c_highlight}Paragon Glyphs{/c} at the {c_highlight}{icon:Marker_GlyphUpgrade, 2} Awakened Glyphstone{/c}.
